## Goal
Create the base page structure and layout container for the Todo app.

## Tasks
- [ ] Build page shell (`page`, `board`, `header`, list container)
- [ ] Add responsive CSS structure
- [ ] Ensure desktop + mobile alignment works

## Acceptance Criteria
- Layout matches design direction
- No overflow/breaking on common viewport sizes
- Build runs successfully
